description: This piece is from one of the first Art In The Bar classes I went to at the Brewery Arts, this was done by tracing lines over a printed image and under the photo I had done block colours with pastels.
title: Cat Line Drawing

description: Vessel Drawing - this class was to teach us to draw to the correct size in relation to other objects.
title: Fine Line Drawing of Various Objects

description: As you can see from behind the easel we had a number of objects together, the aim was to draw negative space.
title: Negative Space Drawing

description: Scribble Technique - I have used a light and dark pastel to show both the light and dark in the rose.
title: Red Rose

description: Group Project - as a group we each got a section of a Chuck Close Portrait and put it together at the end.
title: Grid Group Project
